text: Have been to this restaurant many times in the past and had great experiences.  Have even recommended it to many people at work.  Tonight was not great.  The restaurant was not busy, with six empty tables.  The hostess was leading us to the only small table in the restaurant and I told her twice that we did not wish to sit there because it's too crowded.  She sat us there anyway, against our wishes.  We asked for extra cheese on our <pizza>, but only noticed the pizza had so much sauce, it was a mess to eat.  Don't care for the new staff, and it will be a very long time before I try it again.

restaurant.name: Salvatore's Tomato Pies
